name: Peppermill Penthouse Suite
description: Crafted for an exquisite guest experience, the 1,205 sq. ft. Peppermill Penthouse Suite features an in-room jetted hot tub, steam shower (select rooms), wet bar, refrigerator, luxurious bathrobes, comfortable sofa, dining room table, separate bedroom, 1.5 bathrooms, and four televisions. The pinnacle of Peppermill accommodation.
shortDescription: 1,205 sq. ft. Peppermill Penthouse — jetted hot tub, steam shower, wet bar, and four TVs.
